question: Which of the following is not a recommendation of the task force on direct taxes under the chairmanship of Dr Vijay L. Kelkar in the year 2002?
option2: Increase in the exemption limit of personal income to Rs 1.20 lakh for widows
option4: Exemption from tax on dividends and capital gains from the listed equity
answer: Increase in the exemption limit of personal income to Rs 1.20 lakh for widows
explanation: Increase in the exemption limit of personal income to Rs.1.50 lakh for widows was not one of the recommendations of the Kelkar commission in 2002.
